title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.5 - Disclosure of interest to client
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.5 - Disclosure of interest to client

State Regulations

Before a real estate broker buys property for a client in
the ownership of which the broker has an interest, he shall disclose his
interest to all parties to the transaction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
175.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
